sentences.en: An intense inferno, reaching temperatures of 2500 F will quickly engulf the aircraft.
sentences.cn: 高达2500华氏温度的火焰很快地吞噬整个飞机.

sentences.en: Dread Lord gains Inferno spell, which replaces Dark Summoning.
sentences.cn: 恐怖领主的终极法术是地狱火而不是以前的黑暗召唤.

sentences.en: Helicopter crews far above the inferno felt the heat.
sentences.cn: 直升机机组在距离炼狱更高的上空仍感觉到了热浪.

sentences.en: Inferno logically mirrors Java by including a virtual machine, programming language, and communications protocol.
sentences.cn: Inferno包含 了虚拟机 、 编程语言和通信协议,故在逻辑上是Java的镜像.
这里发生了大火, 到处都是尸体.

sentences.en: Lucent's Inferno is an entire system, designed for embedded systems.
sentences.cn: 朗讯公司的Inferno是为嵌入式系统设计的完整系统.

sentences.en: Rescue workers fought to get to victims inside the inferno.
sentences.cn: 救援人员奋力营救大火中的受害者。

sentences.en: The burning building became an inferno.
sentences.cn: 燃烧着的大楼成了地狱般的地方.

sentences.en: The inferno has killed 64 people in just five days.
sentences.cn: 大火仅在短短五天内就夺去了64人的生命.

sentences.en: The inferno spewed a deadly plume of radioactive isotopes into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 这个象炼狱般的地方将一缕致死的放射性同位素喷入大气层.

sentences.en: The oil wells turned into a raging inferno.
The place was a blazing, raging , roaring, etc inferno.
sentences.cn: 那地方是一片熊熊的 、 滚滚的 、 咆哮的.火海.

sentences.en: The siblings later fought in the first - ever Inferno Match!
sentences.cn: 肯恩为了追打他老哥竟然把铁笼的门都扯下来~~力量惊人!

sentences.en: Tracy Garner: Phil, where the inferno are you guys?
sentences.cn: 特雷西: “菲尔, 你们究竟在什么鬼地方? ”

sentences.en: Yesterday chief executive Peter Kenyon did his best to extinguish the inferno.
sentences.cn: 然而昨天首席执行官肯扬使尽全身解数来定纷止争.
